document_data.name: Lithium
document_data.mainbody: '''Lithium''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Availability: In {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, the [[Elemental Store]] of [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental lithium bricks for 6 [[sp]] per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}}.
document_data.Usage: * Lithium was used in the production of explosive materials by the ancient [[Netherese]].
